str.o: This file system is used only for uploads, the files that are uploaded can either not be downloaded, or they will be scrambled during the download. This is considered a nice way to treat people who try to use your FTP site for warez distribution.
Scrambled downloads: Return files with bitrot
If this function is enabled, downloads are allowed, but the files will be scrambled.
Number of bytes to be sent without any bitrot at all.
Scrambled downloads: Percent of bits to rot
Selects the percentage of the file that will receive bitrot
